title: NKS Complexity Theory
description: Stephen Wolfram's A New Kind of Science (NKS) reimagines complexity through computational frameworks, proposing that simple programs generate intricate behavior. This theory intersects with quantum fields, simulated universes, and evolutionary biology in provocative ways:

previous.title: Artificial Consciousness is Emergent from Simple Rules in Simulated Worlds

next.title: Computational Rules for Consciousness Emergence: A Comprehensive Framework for AI Consciousness Development Through Complexity Theory
